sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'VDLM'; loggeado: boolean = true; public nombre_usuario = localStorage.setItem('nombre_usuario','Raul'); public apellido1 = localStorage.setItem('apellido1','Hernandez'); public apellido2 = localStorage.setItem('apellido2','Saez'); constructor (public router: Router) { if(this.loggeado == true && this.router.url == "/login") { this.router.navigate(['/']); } } }
